article.title: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Centers for Washington State
article.summary: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Centers for Washington State.
article.content:
​​With two offices in Washington State, the U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small-to-medium sized Washington State companies develop international markets.

Three U.S. Export Assistance Centers serve exporters across WA state.

  • Seattle U.S. Export Assistance Center
  • Spokane U.S. Export Assistance Center
  • Portland U.S. Export Assistance Center


Our experienced staff of International Trade Specialists will help you:

  • identify and evaluate international partners
  • navigate international documentation challenges
  • create market entry strategies
  • other export related guidance
article.seometadatatitle: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Centers for Washington State
article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Centers for Washington State.
